snippet.title: SAMURAI MAIDEN - Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
Before the Demon Lord's power brings calamity upon us all...
Before he warps history to his own ends...
I have to fight.

D3PUBLISHER's brand-new Girls Sword-fighting Action game "SAMURAI MAIDEN"
Available Now on PlayStation™Store, Nintendo eShop and Steam!

At the end of the trailer, here is the message from Tsumugi to the people all over the world.

◆PlayStation™Store
Standard Edition:
https://store.playstation.com/en-us/product/UP3177-PPSA08899_00-0000000000000000
Deluxe Edition:
https://store.playstation.com/en-us/product/UP3177-PPSA08899_00-00000000000000DX

◆Nintendo eShop
Standard Edition:
https://www.nintendo.com/store/products/samurai-maiden-switch/
Deluxe Edition:
https://www.nintendo.com/store/products/samurai-maiden-deluxe-edition-switch/

◆Steam
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1952250/


■SPEC
　Title: SAMURAI MAIDEN
　Platforms: PlayStation®5/PlayStation®4*/Nintendo Switch/Steam
　　　　　  *The PS4 version can be upgraded to the PS5 version for free.
　Release Date: December 8th, 2022
　Genre: Girls Sword-fighting Action
　# of Player: 1
　Developer: SHADE Inc.
　Voice Actors: Yuki Yomichi (Tsumugi Tamaori) / Miku Ito (Iyo) / Sumire Uesaka (Hagane) / Miyu Tomita (Komimi) / Shuka Saito (Shingen Takeda) / Emi Uema (Kenshin Uesugi) / Takaya Kuroda (Nobunaga Oda) etc.
　Main Character Design: Miwano Rag
　Publisher: D3PUBLISHER Inc.

Follow the latest news on:
■Official Website
　https://www.d3p.co.jp/s_maiden/

■Twitter
　https://twitter.com/s_maiden_en

■Instagram
　https://www.instagram.com/s_maiden_en/


©2022 SHADE Inc. ©2022 D3PUBLISHER
